WikiRating-i18n-welcome: Welcome to the localization file of the WikiRating extension.
WikiRating-helloworld-intro: Welcome to the "Hello world" special page of the WikiRating extension.
api-help-param-title: The title with Course: namespace string prepended
api-help-param-revid: The revision id of the page
api-help-param-revisions: If present, return the rating information about all revisions of the page
api-help-pagerating-example: Get the page rating information of the last revision of Course:Modern Physics.
